title: Mullen Automotive Featured by Yahoo Finance Live - Yahoo Finance
content: Mullen Automotive Featured by Yahoo Finance Live  Yahoo Finance
description: Yahoo Finance Live's Brad Smith, David Briggs, and Rachelle Akuffo identified MULN as an EV stock standout that is doing well among falling EV stocks due to its solid-state battery technology and strong domestic presence. Mullen Automotive Featured Recently in Yahoo Finance Live Segment MULN stock is picking up steam and interest following Mullen’s recent announcements.
